Element.question: Does the patient have pain with urination?
Is the pain internal (inside) when urinating or external (outside) when the urine touches the skin?
Is the patient experiencing any of the following? Check all that apply:
Element.choices: Need to urinate more than normal,Feeling of not getting all urine out while urinating,Leaking urine when not trying to urinate,Unusual urine color,Blood in urine

Element.question: How many days has the patient has difficulty with urination? Has the discomfort gotten worse over several days or did it get much worse over 1-2 days
Does anything make the pain better?
Does anything make the pain worse?
Check all that apply:
Element.choices: Previous Bladder or Urine Infection,Experiencing Fever or Chills,New Lower Abdomen Pain,New Lower Back Pain,New Side (Flank) Pain,New Sexual Partners

Element.question: When was the last time the patient had a bladder or urine infection?
How did the patient treat the infection?
Is the patient female or male?
